title: Monopolist operates in elastic region of demand

content.question: For an unregulated monopolist, the profit- maximizing quantity will always be

choices.label: in the elastic region of the demand curve
where price equals average total cost
where the marginal cost curve intersects the demand curve

content.answer: in the elastic region of the demand curve

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
